titleInfo.title: Oral history interview with John S. Bransford, Sr., 1980 July 09, excerpt 01

physicalDescription.note: Excerpted from: HNIOHBransfordJ audio cassette recording converted to mp3 format in 2006.

location.physicalLocation: Special Collections Division of the Nashville Public Library, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219

mods.abstract: An excerpt from an oral history interview with Nashville investor John S. Bransford, Sr., conducted on 9 July 1980 by Leanne Thornton as part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. 1910-1935 Oral History Project. Bransford discusses moving to Belle Meade with his family in 1914 and what the Belle Meade area was like at the time. The complete interview, as well an index, is available in the Special Collections Division.

titleInfo.title: Historic Nashville, Inc. 1910-1935 Oral History Project
